title: Patrice Evra
summary: Patrice Latyr Evra (born 15 May 1981) is a French football coach and former professional player. Originally a forward, he primarily played as a left-back.[4] Evra, whom manager Sir Alex Ferguson praised for his leadership, also describing him as one of the best left-backs in Europe,[5] served as captain for both Manchester United and the France national team.[6][7]
